tool_description: An API showing the latest Coronavirus News from Switzerland
name: Switzerland Coronavirus News
title: Switzerland Coronavirus News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Gets News about Coronavirus in Switzerland from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://switzerland-coronavirus-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/srf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "switzerland-coronavirus-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://switzerland-coronavirus-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "switzerland-coronavirus-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Coronavirus News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Coronavirus change from Switzerland.
